title: Gary Ponzo - The Last Mountain Gorilla [Epub & Mobi] { KT }
description:
The Last Mountain Gorilla (Short Story with 2 Bonus Stories) by Gary Ponzo



From 2-time Pushcart-Prize nominee, Gary Ponzo, comes a new short story about a journalist attempting to capture photos of the Last Mountain Gorilla in the Virunga National Forest. What he doesn't realize is he's being hunted by a group of militia who don't want him to know the secrets of the Mountain Gorilla's demise. A pressure-packed story from the first sentence to the last. 

BONUS STORIES: 

A Simple Solution: A Scientist tries to discover the cure for a rare disorder which inflicts his younger brother. Unfortunately, it may cost him his marriage in the process. Until he discovers a simple solution. 

The Escape Artist: A man is trying to escape from prison. But is he trying to leave the prison or is there something else he's trying to escape from? 

"Gary Ponzo is a talented writer whose fiction contains a sharp wit that is honed to a cutting literary voice all fiction readers should hear." 

- Ed Knight, Journey Books
